channel.title: Making an item limited
channel.description:
Is it possible to make an item limited to a certain amount so only that amount can be in fr33sc4pe? (Example: ::pickup 0773 1...... Result: You can not spawn that item, There is only a limited amount.)
I was hoping to make the 'Perfect' ring on the server limited to a certain amount like 3..
I don't wanna ban the item so only admins can use it, I just want it to be the rarest unspawnable item. :confused:[br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2007, 04:40:54 PM[/size][hr]Why does no one want to help out a noob.... :(
Is it possible do just even disable the item completely so you cant spawn it? And the remaining ones are the only ones? Someone help please?
I've searched for hours for results and found nothing.

item.title: Making an item limited
item.description:
@1080 wrote:

umm or you can set it so if player rights = 3 aka owner… thats the onyl one who can spawn… and admins rights are 2… so solved problem

Read full topic

item.title: Making an item limited
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

I don’t think you can disable ::pickup/::item. If you can’t trust your admins to do something they shouldn’t be an admin. Demote them, demote them!

Read full topic

item.title: Making an item limited
item.dc:creator: @Muffinator Muffinator
item.description:
@Muffinator wrote:

Yea but I mean like make it disabled with ::pickup… Ive had cases of some of my admins were spawning them so I want to disable it completely

Read full topic

item.title: Making an item limited
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

You make it sound so hard lol. Easiest thing to do is make a command for Perfect Ring’s like, ::ring or something. Then after you’ve spawned the amount you wanted, change the command to something random so only you can remember it.

Understand what I’m sayin’?

Read full topic

item.title: Making an item limited
item.dc:creator: @Muffinator Muffinator
item.description:
@Muffinator wrote:

I Br3ndan I:

So what you wan’t to do is spawn like 20 or so Perfect Ring’s and then discontinue them so that no more can be spawned?

YES THATS EXACTLY WHAT I WANT!!!

Read full topic
